WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I have a ListBox. I set a new item data template:

<ListBox.ItemTemplate>
    <DataTemplate DataType="model:GeneralUser">
        <StackPanel >
             <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal">
                 <Label Content="{Binding FourLetterCode}" Margin="0,0,15,0"/>
                 <Label Content="{Binding DisplayName}"/>
             </StackPanel>
            <Label Content="{Binding EmailAddress}"/>
        </StackPanel>
     </DataTemplate>
</ListBox.ItemTemplate>

Selected item foreground is not White anymore but black.
Which is not user friendly at all.
